Message:
Days passed and I was able
to finish his portrait just as
my materials were about to
run out.

...But, this painting’ll probably
rot away after I die, huh?

But, the fact that there
was once a city here...
the fact that people once
happily lived their lives here...

It’s kinda sad that those
memories’ll get washed away.

When the rain stops,
guess I’ll paint an
even bigger picture.
